channel.title: Freezing @ 'Loading - Please wait' on Silabsoft's Webclient
channel.description:
Whenever I log into a server with Jagex items, it freezes at the 'Loading - Please wait'
Anybody know why?
I've tried on over 30 servers *literally*
I'm pretty sure my java is at 6 update 3..or 4...
Thx
*NOTE: I have Vista.

item.title: Freezing @ 'Loading - Please wait' on Silabsoft's Webclient
item.dc:creator: @Hockey4lifexx Hockey4lifexx
item.description:
@Hockey4lifexx wrote:

[quote=“liamthomas2, post:2, topic:175058”]Find A TUT on it. I’ve seen hundreds! Its summin’ to do with JavaDumpin’ or memory usage or something like that.

As You can see im not a master technition or even a technacle guy but i thought i’d be polite and Post

…:: L1AM ::…[/quote]

no it doesnt lol…

MOST windows vista computers do this, including my laptop. its gay so idk what else to do. (i play on my other comp with xp)

Read full topic
